Articles.Content:
Saw an old challenge a while back and I want to try it so I made a large ship that without dropping tanks and engines is an ssto on kerbin and with dropping the tanks can reach kerbol escape velocity in 5 minutes but with a lander it could probably visit eve then duna and then Joel and its moons laythe and vall then eloo and back to kerbin with fuel to spare.

I am using a total of 36 toroidal aero spike engines due to the efficiency and it is also set up to drop its solar panels and still be operational past jool. Deu to my computer not wanting to add the picture it is my background photo.

Edited June 3, 2016 by Buzz light fear
